ygData.subject: Re: Poison, vials, pottery and a SPOILER at the bottom
ygData.msgSnippet: I was able to make 4 out of 8 with useing Mist wolf pelts, high Quality lion Skins, and the polar bear skins. The one problem i had was trying to fire it, i
ygData.messageBody:
I was able to make 4 out of 8 with useing Mist wolf pelts, high Quality
lion Skins, and the polar bear skins. The one problem i had was trying to
fire it, i would use 1 unfired vial and 1 firing sheet, and with all 3
types of firing sheets, i get the these do not combine into anything
usefull. I may have messed something up, but i will try again when i can
get more skins.

And btw, make sure you are not useing ruined skins.

Jinanu of The Rathe (15 Shaman and wants wis eq)

On Fri, 30 Jul 1999, kale usi wrote:

> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> >
> >From: "Xillitil of Povar" <xillitil@...>
> >
> >text at bottom since it has spoilers...
> >
> >>
> >>From: "Jon Emberton" <javan@...>
> >>
> >>Hail
> >>
> >>Here is what some of our better potters have come up with as far as a good
> >>possibility. This formula was tried and they did not get the msg these
> >>Items do not combine to create anything. They simply got you do not have
> >>enough skill.
> >>
> >>WARNING ***SPOILER***
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>1 small clay
> >>1 water flask
> >>1 poison vial sketch
> >>and
> >>1 polar bear skin!
> >>other skins have been tried and the same not enough skill msg has been
> >>recieved.
> >>
> >>
> >>Hope this helps I would love to see potters yelling POISON VIALS for sale!
> >>
> >>Good Journeys
> >>
> >>Denali
> >>19 rogue Povar
> >>
> >also verified black wolf skin and puma skin for vials and lined vials
> >sealed does not use same recipe, also tried replacing small clay with med
> >clay, large clay, and 2 small clay...with no luck
> >poison vials are trivial at 148, will post again when i max with lined
> >vials...
> >
> >Will be selling them on Povar at least until i max my skill, mebbe longer
> >if
> >they are profitable...
> >
> >Xillitil/Povar
>
>
> Tried making these last night with the same exact recipe. Got the "does not
> combine" message. Do you need to be a rogue or have the tattered book with
> the poison recipes in it?
